title: The Destruction And Redemption of General Flynn (Ep 1246)
description:
In this episode I address the bombshell revelations in the General Mike Flynn case. 

News Picks:

Finally! The DOJ drops the case against General Mike Flynn.

Troubled Mueller prosecutor Van Grack withdraws from the broken Flynn case.


Media tyrants are losing it over the exoneration of General Mike Flynn.

Another anti-Trump conspiracy falls apart. 

Why was this Pentagon a list investigated in January, 2017? 

Why did Steele delete his emails on January 5th. 

The Washington Post article referenced in the show.


Liberals are melting down over the Flynn exoneration.

The unemployment numbers are devastating.
